Sentencas: The Al2O3-based seals were prepared by tape casting process using Al2O3 and At fine powders, as primary starting materials.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The materials' hermetic properties were tested in simulative environment of the sealing of planar ITSOFC, and the materials after hermetic property test were characterized by X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show the flexible Al2O3-based seals are successfully prepared by appropriate tape casting process.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Al2O3-based seals have favorable sealing characteristics even though the compressive stresses are quite low.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The leak paths are reduced and the tortuosity of leak paths are aggrandized when At fine powders are added into Al2O3-based seals, which enhance the materials' hermetic property and mid-term stabilities.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is feasible that Al2O3-based seals with 10wt%-20wt% Al fine powders prepared by tape casting are used as sealing materials for the planar ITSOFCs.
Titulo: Al2O3-based compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
